title: Thai coconut rice noodle soup
ingredients: ['1L vegetable stock', '5cm fresh root ginger, peeled and sliced thinly', '3 garlic cloves, minced', '1/2 stalk fresh lemon grass, minced', '225g rice vermicelli', '1 (400ml) tin light coconut milk', '1 (330ml) tin coconut water', '200g pak choi, cut into strips', '1 large carrot, peeled and grated', '6 closed cup white mushrooms, sliced', '300g peeled and deveined prawns or finely diced chicken breast fillets', 'red Thai curry paste, to taste', 'soy sauce, to taste', 'Thai fish sauce, to taste (optional)', 'minced fresh coriander', 'salt']
